title: Max Manus Man of War (2008)  (AUTHENTIC U.K. EDITION  SUBS)
description:
Max Manus Man of War (2008) (AUTHENTIC U.K.EDITION)

aka:
Man of War (2008)
Man of War Max Manus (2008)
Max Manus: Man of War (2008) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1029235/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1029235/</a>
http://www.manofwar.co.uk/

With official English subtitles hardcoded

Explosive story of the famous Norwegian war hero is finally available with proper English subtitles in this authentic U.K. edition DVD. Some versions with home-made subtitles have been available on the net, but alas full of errors and misunderstandings.

"Awesome! Epic, explosive & utterly mesmerising" (Talksport Magazine)
"Visually stunning, powerful & uniquely moving" (Blockbuster.co.uk)

In my opinion, this is the best Norwegian film made during the last decades. If you like it, I hope you will show your support by buying or renting the DVD, as I did myself. It has valuable extras, among then an exclusive documentary.

English is spoken in several scenes in the film, as well as German and Swedish, but the overall dialogue is in original Norwegian. No plans exist for an English-dubbed version of this movie.

My ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

A rip of the Nordic edition of this DVD with optional Nordic subtitles (DK, Fi, No, Se) is found at <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4930950/Max_Manus_(2008)_DVDrip_(Norwegian___opt.SUBS_DK_FI_NO_SE)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4930950/Max_Manus_(2008)_DVDrip_(Norwegian___opt.SUBS_DK_FI_NO_SE)</a>

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
